# Welcome to your Cloud IDE Lab!

## Getting Started

On your left, you'll find the instructions for the tasks you need to complete in this lab. Follow them step-by-step to achieve the objectives of this lab. You can also click the chat button to ask for help from Tai, your AI Teaching Assistant at any time.

On your right is the Cloud IDE tool, a fully-featured Integrated Development Environment (IDE) that you'll be using to write, run, and debug your code. Here are some key components of the Cloud IDE tool:

- **File Browser**: Navigate through your files and directories.
- **Terminal**: Run your code and see the output here.
- **Skills Network Toolbox**: Access various technologies like databases and Embeddable AI with just a click.

## Working with the Cloud IDE

1. **Navigating the File Browser**: 
    - Click on the folders to expand/collapse them.
    - Right-click on a file or folder for more options.
2. **Using the Terminal**:
    - You can run your code by typing the necessary commands in the terminal.
    - Use the up and down arrow keys to cycle through your previous commands.
3. **Utilizing the Skills Network Toolbox**:
    - Click on the toolbox icon (<img width="40" class="figure" alt="Skills Netowrk Toolbox Icon" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"></img>) on the left menubar to open the Skills Network Toolbox.

    - Select the technology you want to work with and follow the on-screen instructions.

Enjoy coding, and remember, you can refer to the instructions on the left at any time during the lab!
